items.text: Jarvis tests Kayes with a short one, and he manages to control a leg-side hack for a single
items.shortText: Jarvis to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.preText: Mid off and mid on are up in the circle now.
items.text: a slower ball from Jarvis, and Mushfiqur reads it well enough to defend to cover
items.postText: Nadim: "Imrul has this tendency of playing well and suddenly loosing control and giving away wicket to a pull shot, lack of confidence or concentration or both?"
items.shortText: Jarvis to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: Mushfiqur dances down, but he telegraphed his move and Jarvis saw him coming. He drags his length back and also drops his pace, and the best Mushfiqur can do is run the ball to third man
items.shortText: Jarvis to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: as he has done all night, Jarvis continues to hit a length there and thereabouts, and Kayes taps to point
items.shortText: Jarvis to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: another short one, but this time it's met with a little less control and a little more violence by Kayes. But he still rolls his wrists on the shot to keep it down, and the ball rolls to the man at deep fine leg
items.shortText: Jarvis to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.preText: Masakadza calls on Raza's golden arm as well now, possibly for the last time in the game with just 37 needed. Still the captain is at slip.
items.text: Raza starts around the wicket, and he immediately finds a good line on middle and off
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: Kayes stays deep in his crease to slap the ball at the back foot, but it's straight to cover
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: speared down the leg side
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Imrul Kayes, 1 wide

items.text: Kayes holes out! Was this necessary? With just a few runs needed, and ten away from what could have been two consecutive hundreds, Kayes has given it away. Chigumbura was placed down at long off, but Kayes dances down and tries to beat him with a lofted drive, but he wasn't quite to the pitch and didn't get all of it. In fact, the ball was dying in front of Chigumbura and he had to get in quickly to catch it. Raza strikes again, but is it too little too late?
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Imrul Kayes, OUT

dismissal.text: Imrul Kayes c Chigumbura b Sikandar Raza 90 (111b 7x4 0x6) SR: 81.08

items.text: Mithun is rooted to the crease as he has a look and pushes to cover
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: again the batsman stays very deep to work a ball that's just a little too short through extra cover
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Mohammad Mithun, 2 runs

items.text: in the air ... but short of the fielder in the deep! Mithun is wasting no time, and he was aiming for the second tier with this slog sweep. But he didn't get the timing he needed, and the ball hung in the night air for an age. But the fielder charging round from midwicket couldn't get there in time
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Mohammad Mithun, 2 runs

items.text: neatly punched through cover for one
items.shortText: Jarvis to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: a short ball from Jarvis, and Mithun has a good old look at it as it fizzes past his left ear. No shot played
items.shortText: Jarvis to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: slower one from Jarvis, the cutter, and Mithun's backfoot punch is intercepted at cover. They've added extra protection in that region for Jarvis
items.shortText: Jarvis to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: smell that! Jarvis bent his back on this bouncer, and this time it drew a hook shot from Mithun, but he's late on it and the ball ricochets off bat, grille and body before hitting the ground
items.shortText: Jarvis to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: this is canny bowling. Jarvis floats down a slower ball, full and wide of off, and Mithun can't lay bat on it with a flat footed poke
items.shortText: Jarvis to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: another short one, but this time it's slower ... and also misdirected down the leg side
items.shortText: Jarvis to Mohammad Mithun, 1 wide

items.text: Mithun is back and across to push to cover, and that ends another fine over from Jarvis
items.postText: Mashur: "I am not sure if it would be an overstatement but provided the team-spirit & character shown in recent days despite the missing of their key players, Bangladesh would be a contender of championship in the upcoming World Cup! "
items.shortText: Jarvis to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: a flat-batted drive is stopped at cover, no run to be had
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: ah, Mushfiqur's missed out on a full toss outside off here. He slashes at the ball but sends it straight to point
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: a much better delivery, and it's treated as such. Worked to leg
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: deft touch from Mushfiqur, as he sends the ball down to third man with a delicate late cut
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Mushfiqur Rahim, 2 runs

items.text: Mushfiqur was looking to work this to leg, but the ball takes the inside edge into his pad
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: nudged down to third man, just the one
items.postText: And here's Shashank to take you to the close.
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run
